product.title: Thunder Grey & Stone - 50mm Slat
product.description: This thunder grey & stone brings softness, beauty and contemporary flair to your home in an instant, thanks to the smooth, light slats and contrasting warm tapes. This combination of cool and cosy shades, plus the contrast of hard wood slats and soft fabric tapes makes this this thunder grey & stone brings softness, beauty and contemporary flair to your home in an instant, thanks to the smooth, light slats and contrasting warm tapes.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Grey Roller Blind
relproducts.description: A highly popular range, loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their stockholmfabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This grey roller blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories. This roller blind with accompanying white components and grey fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Rock Grey Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their moisture-resistant, stockholm rock roller blind is a stunning mid grey hue. It's a modern, on trend colour choice & will be a perfect finishing touch for your window. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including the option of a rust free chain so you can get just the perfect finishing touches for your window. This blind also comes with 5 year guarantee as standard, giving you peace of mind that you blind is built to last.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Mid Grey Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm mid grey roller blinds are a beautiful contemporary cool grey colour. A timeless grey colour that will compliment most color palettes within the home or office. Their roller blinds can be manufactured with smooth control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your space. Also, their made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee providing additional peace of mind when investing in this product.

relproducts.title: Valencia Touchstone Grey Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Sleek, straightforward and stylish, this valencia touchstone grey roller blind is perfect for adding warmth to a contemporary space. The pebbly grey fabric is chic and fashionable, but has an earthy tone that lends a little more cosiness. Its a hardwearing fabric too, easy to c sleek, straightforward and stylish, this valencia touchstone grey roller blind is perfect for adding warmth to a contemporary space.

relproducts.title: Roma Thunderbird - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Roma thunderbird is not a shade to be missed - as in, it simply can't be. Bold and memorable, this blind is almost opaque, yet doesn't block out the light entirely, making for a great compromise. Don't be shy; use the thunderbird as a central feature in your white or cream kitchen, or go bold in the bathroom by opting for a non-traditional colour scheme of red and white. Or you might find that this daring red provides you with all the motivation you need in your home office.

relproducts.description: Rebel thunder made to measure vertical blind.

relproducts.description: Aria thunder made to measure vertical blind.

relproducts.title: Thunderstorm Aluminium Venetian
relproducts.description: The grey thnderstorm aluminium venetian blind is a lovely, darker grey tone - ideal for pairing with darker colour in the rest of your room, or for being the darker focal point of your room. Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Raise and lower your blind to the perfect height, and then angle the venetian slats to control the light entering your home.

relproducts.title: Roma Thunderbird - Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: The roma in thunderbird is the ideal filter blind for keeping just the right amount of light in your room when you need a little privacy or shade. Combine with that the dark, red hue and you have style and usability all in one. This strong, striking blind is here to make a statement, and a statement it will make. Help it along by placing against white or cream walls in your kitchen or dining room to really make it pop.

relproducts.title: Lux Thunder Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: With is textured finish, this verical blind is perfect for adding a layer of style to your window without compromising on quality. Being dimout, it will gently fileter the light entering your room when closed. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

relproducts.description: Using matt and sheen threads of the chosen colour to create an eye catching marbled effect. Other colours available. Semana thunder roller blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

relproducts.title: Origin Brushed Silver - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The ultra-metallic brushed silver from the origin range is the height of utilitarian style. With a polished, near-matte finish, the blind's aluminium slats are sturdy and hardwearing, and easily controlled using the colour-matched cords that hang from the sides. The beauty of the brushed silver is that it can be used as part of a room's central colour scheme, or incorporated as a simple accent, in the same way as a fixture or fitting might.
